name: Cranberry-Lime Salsa
recipeIngredient: Juice of 1 large lime, or to taste
4 to 5 fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded and minced
1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Sort through the berries, discarding any that are withered or soft. Place the remainder in a blender or food processor and puree until they are fairly smooth.
Scrape the puree into a bowl. Blend in the lime juice, honey, tequila, jalapenos and cilantro. Adjust the flavor to taste. Cover and refrigerate overnight.
